title: Please Help with BUG!
body: I play LOL on a mac. I have not updated to the most recent iOS. After Patch 7.4, whenever I try to open League, the Application is simply a black screen. No matter where I try and open it from (Applications folder, Dock, Steam (I added it in) or even from a spotlight search) it gives me the black screen. I have been trying for days to open this but cannot find to even reach the login screen. HELP!

replies.body: This black screen issue may be a result of a connection problem failing to grab assets from our servers.  To start, run through the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help tune things up!
I got it to work! Thank you, thank you thank you.
